offenceResults.offenceTitle: Drive motor vehicle fail comply with red / green arrow / lane closure light signals - automatic equipment
offenceResults.impositionOffenceDetails:
FO - Fine
Fined £456.00
IMP - Imprisonment
Committed to prison for 9 Years. Reason: failure to comply with requirements of post custodial sentence supervision because of an unprovoked attack of a serious nature, because the defendant has a flagrant disregard for court orders, because the defendant has a flagrant disregard for people and their property. Bail remand days to count (Tagged Days): 45. Total custodial period is life.
 
 
ABDC - Application made for benefit deductions
Application made for benefit deductions.
FVS - Surcharge
To pay a surcharge of £4332.00
RINSTL - Reserve Terms Instalments only
Reserve Terms Instalments only. £43.00 to be paid monthly from 11/11/2025
Total custodial period is life.
